info.name: Requests API (used by Jenkins) - Admin - Public
info.description: This collection contains requests used by Jenkins to test our API

exec: //Demandeur externe can only read the site

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/54.0.2840.99 Safari/537.36

request.description: test if resaframe in prod is up

exec: tests["Lannion resaframe ASSO select seems fine"] = responseCode.code === 200;

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/54.0.2840.99 Safari/537.36

exec: tests["La Montagne resaframe ASSO select seems fine"] = responseCode.code === 200;

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/54.0.2840.99 Safari/537.36

exec: tests["Response time is less than 1000ms"] = responseTime < 1000;
//Check if the content type is json
//Tests below allow you to test user's bdd
tests["get Users Bdd as Gestionnaire"] = jsonData.result[0].user_id[1]==='dst 02'; //Gestionnaire
tests["get Users Bdd as Demandeur externe"] = jsonData.result[0].user_id[1]==='DUPONT Chantal';//Demandeur externe
tests["get current Group"] = jsonData.result[0].current_group[1] ==='Gestionnaire des demandes';
// When the person's right is Adminitrator return true, otherwise it will return false
// When the person's right is Adminitrator or  Gestionnaire return true, otherwise it will return false
// When the person's right is Adminitrator or  Gestionnaire return true, otherwise it will return false

request.description: pour connaitre des infos à renseigner dans la demande

get company currency defined in openerp
Configuration -> Company -> Devises

body.raw:
{
  "id": "r7",
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "call",
  "params": {
    "data": {
      "context_tz": "Europe/Paris",
      "hex_color": "#2B0652",
      "service_id": false,
      "service_ids": [[6,  0,[]]],
      "is_assignable_to_task": false,
      "is_bookable_manager": false,
      "image": false,
      "login": "{{userLogin}}",
      "new_password": "user1Mdp",
      "name": "{{userName}}",
      "function": "userFonction",
      "email": "user@domain.com",
      "phone": "0240033021",
      "mobile": "0660353212",
      "street": "rue",
      "zip": "44100",
      "city": "nantes",
      "partner_id": {{resPartner.id}},
      "groups_id": [[6,0,[{{resGroups.Demandeur.id}},  {{resGroups.DemandeurExterne.id}}]]]
    },
    "model": "res.users",
    "session_id": "{{sessionId}}",
    "context": {
      "__ref": "compound_context",
      "__contexts": [
        {
          "lang": "fr_FR",
          "tz": "Europe/Paris",
          "uid": "{{uid}}"
        },
        {"bin_size": true}
      ],
      "__eval_context": null
    }
  }
}

request.description:
resGroups.id = Demandeur externe
28 : Demandeur
resPartner.id = Particuliers Commune

exec: tests["Response time is less than 2000ms"] = responseTime < 2000;
//Check if the content type is json
tests["water categories exists and unique"] = jsonData.result.length>0;

request.description: get les organisations dont le nom contient 'particuliers'

body.raw:
{
  "id": "r3",
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "call",
  "params": {
    "sort": "name ASC",
    "limit": 0,
    "offset": 0,
    "fields": [
      "id",
      "name",
      "implied_ids",
      "trans_implied_ids",
      "category_id",
      "code"
    ],
    "model": "res.groups",
    "domain": [
      [
        "category_id",
        "in",
        [
          140,
          142,
          143,
          157,
          145
        ]
      ],
      "|",
      "|",
      "|",
      [
        "comment",
        "ilike",
        "Demandeur externe"
      ],
      [
        "code",
        "ilike",
        "Demandeur externe"
      ],
      [
        "name",
        "ilike",
        "Demandeur externe"
      ],
      [
        "full_name",
        "ilike",
        "Demandeur externe"
      ]
    ],
    "session_id": "{{sessionId}}",
    "context": {
      "__ref": "compound_context",
      "__contexts": [
        {
          "lang": "fr_FR",
          "tz": "Europe/Paris",
          "uid": {{uid}}
        },
        {
          "bin_size": true
        }
      ],
      "__eval_context": null
    }
  }
}

exec: tests["Return a result when get Organization"] = jsonData.result.length > 0;
// Demandeur externe has no action exist
tests["Return an equipment category id"] = jsonData.result.result > 0;
tests["Return a vehicle model id"] = jsonData.result.result > 0;
tests["Check vehicle brand id exist"] = jsonData.result.result > 0;
tests["Return a vehicle brand id"] = jsonData.result.result > 0;
tests["Can update an organization with new sites"] = jsonData.result.result = true;
